title: WTF Are NFTs? | Sharon Stone
itunes:title: WTF Are NFTs? | Sharon Stone
description:
The CDC's change in COVID-19 mask guidelines creates an uproar, Ronny Chieng learns about the value of NFTs, and Sharon Stone discusses her book "The Beauty of Living Twice."

To support Best Friends Animal Society in their work saving the lives of cats and dogs all across America, check out The Daily Show Dogs Charity Collection at www.dailyshow.com/dailyshowdogs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
